name: TheBlessing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The famous blessing from Numbers 6:24-26, given to the Kohanim to speak over Gods people. May you be blessed today by His presence and experience His Kingdom come and His will be done right here on earth - Just as it is in Heaven!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
